cmp: 虫 (insect/worm, an animal/an invertebrate/a worm/an insect)

exm.mng: The sparrow may be small but all its vital organs are there (idiom)., small but complete in every detail
exm.pyn: má què suī xiǎo , wǔ zàng jù quán

exm.mng: lit. although dead, as if still alive (idiom); still with us in spirit
lit. although dead, also honored; died a glorious death
although small, a steelyard weight may tip a hundred pounds (idiom), apparently insignificant details can have a large impact, for want of a nail the battle was lost
exm.pyn: chèng tuó suī xiǎo yā qiān jīn

exm.cur: 牡丹虽好，终须绿叶扶持
exm.trd: 牡丹雖好，終須綠葉扶持
exm.mng: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
exm.pyn: mǔ dan suī hǎo , zhōng xū lǜ yè fú chí

exm.cur: 牡丹虽好，全仗绿叶扶持
exm.trd: 牡丹雖好，全仗綠葉扶持
exm.mng: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
exm.pyn: mǔ dan suī hǎo , quán zhàng lǜ yè fú chí

exm.cur: 牡丹虽好，全凭绿叶扶持
exm.trd: 牡丹雖好，全憑綠葉扶持
exm.mng: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
exm.pyn: mǔ dan suī hǎo , quán píng lǜ yè fú chí

exm.mng: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
exm.pyn: mǔ dan suī hǎo , quán zhàng lǜ yè fú

exm.mng: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
exm.pyn: mǔ dan suī hǎo , quán zhàng lǜ yè fú

exm.mng: The sparrow may be small but all its vital organs are there (idiom)., small but complete in every detail
exm.pyn: má què suī xiǎo , wǔ zàng jù quán
